TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: Converts colors from one data type to another.

span.span: Converts colors from one data type to another.
Access this class through the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從字串轉換成時預期使用資格不符的色彩名稱; 否則會在轉換過程中發生例外狀況。When converting from a string to a the expects the unqualified color name; otherwise, an exception will occur in the conversion process. 例如，您應該將傳遞 「 藍色 」，不是"System.Drawing.Color.Blue"或"Color.Blue"，給方法。For example, you should pass "Blue", not "System.Drawing.Color.Blue" or "Color.Blue", to the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 此程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowColorConverter`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste this code into a form and call the `ShowColorConverter` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Converters#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Converters#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Converters#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/VB/form1.vb#2)]
